Key Match Events: England won by 8 wickets (with 15 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and elected to bowl first
Roston Chase wins the battle with Shai Hope for the middle-order spot
Romario Shepherd returns from paternity leave, replacing Obed McCoy
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on a fine batting deck at the Daren Sammy National Stadium
Others: The defending champions made light work of their target of 181
West Indies made 180/4 in their innings
